title: Using Forge with Blink web framework
author: David Buzinski
summary: Pair up Forge with Blink web framework for surprising results. Create amazingly responsive web apps using only MATLAB code!

title: Super charge your configuration with Forge
author: David Buzinski
summary: Forge can render reusable yaml or json files in a snap. Take your team's configuration to the next level!

title: Getting started with Forge
author: David Buzinski
summary: Learn how to use Forge to manage all of your templating needs with MATLAB!
